title: The Four Humors
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]
[[=]]
“You see things too simply, doctor! Expand your horizons. Life and death, sickness and health, these are amateur terms for amateur physicians. There is only one ailment that exists in the world of men, and that is the [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-049 Pestilence]. And nothing else! Make no mistake, they were very ill, all of them.”

[[image https://i.imgur.com/3zLeqjO.jpeg]]

[[/=]]
author: Rosyfox2002
